titleStmt.title: Letter, Maberry, Giller, & Watkin in Philadelphia, Penn., to Maj. David Burford in Dixon Springs, Tenn., 1839 Feb. 25

publicationStmt.publisher: The University of Tennessee Libraries Digital Initiatives

availability.p: The copyright interests in this collection remain with the creator. For more information, contact the Special Collections Library.

bibl.title: Letter, Maberry, Giller, & Watkin in Philadelphia, Penn., to Maj. David Burford in Dixon Springs, Tenn., 1839 Feb. 25

projectDesc.p: Machine-readable transcription created for the University of Tennessee Libraries Special Collections.

editorialDecl.p: Errors in transcription of the printed text not controlled.
Editorial tags limited to gap and unclear.
Catchwords and directional notes such as "turn page over" have been omitted.

revisionDesc.change: Approximate date of original transcription and transcriber.
Migrating from P4 to validated TEI P5.

div.p: Yours of the 10th Jan we have rec c Stating you had received from W Thomas Pheps $250, last March & had written us requesting us to draw on you for that amount - Which letter we have never received - we believe there is no bank nearer you than Nashville - if it is not troubling you too much, we shall be be obliged if you will send us a draft for the amount please enclose their not to us also -
You will please accept our thanks for your attention - M G & W
